TopicTitle: Heavy UI-Flicker both in-flight and at KSC

Articles.Content:
**KSP Version**: KSP 1.0.0, BuildID=00830; 32-bit Steam-version running on Win7x64

**What happens:** All UI-elements flicker in random patterns, frequency increasing with time played. Occasionally there's also pixel-noise or random shapes flicker up, but the UI-flicker is the most consistent problem.

**Mods**: All Stock

**Steps to replicate**: Just start playing, the first flickers will appear after 10-15 minutes, after that it gets progressively worse. I've included a short video below, that was fairly early in the session because I didn't want to wait until it becomes unplayable.

It happens in flight, at KSC, inside the VAB, inside the UI-only buildings like the administration building.

It **does not** happen in the main menu (at least so far).

Graphics card is GTX765M, so it should easily be able to handle this. I've played default settings, minimum settings and the settings recommended by Nvidia full-screen and windowed, no effect. I also updated the graphics driver for this bug, again, the flicker persists.

**Fixes/Workarounds**: Restarting KSP regularly.
